author: Zoe Tidman, Zoe Tidman
title: 'We will send police. With flamethrowers': Italy's mayors rage at residents ignoring coronavirus lockdown
description: 'You aren't Will Smith in I Am Legend,' says Giuseppe Falcomatà
content:
Italian mayors have lashed out at citizens breaking lockdown rules during the coronavirus pandemic. 
Exasperated politicians have criticised people for carrying on with normal activities such as getting a haircut or playing table tennis while the country has… [+1905 chars]
